info.description:
OTA Platform segments the REST operation in 5 types of methods (ill be described in the following sections) that are:
    1. Campaign API Methods
    2. Messaging API Methods
    3. Provisioning API Methods
    4. RAM API Methods
    5. Scenario API Methods
info.title: OTAP RESTful API

tags.name: RAM API Methods
tags.description: The set of operations on this section allow remote applet management operations (RAM) to be executed on the SIM Card.

tags.name: Scenario API Methods
tags.description: This api allow to send several operations to a sim card group by a scenario.

post.description: The activate method is used by the MNO service to assign a MSISDN to an IMSI or ICCID

200.description:
The possible status and descriptions are: 

 0, OK

 1, OTA Platform Internal Error

 2, MSISDN wrong format

 3, Unknown MSISDN

 4, IMSI wrong format

 5, Unknown IMSI

 6, ICCID wrong format

 7, Unknown ICCID

 27, One result is expected, but more than one result is obtained

post.description: Send Campaign using the BatchService

422.description:
Unprocessable Entry 

The possible errors and descriptions are: 

 1, OTA Platform Internal Error

 2, ATTEMPTS wrong format

 3, BEARER wrong format

 4, DESCRIPTION wrong format

 5, ERROR_DELAY wrong format

 6, FILE wrong format

 7, Unknown FILE

 8, MAX_FILETIME wrong format

 9, XML FILE wrong format

11, Batch Internal Error

post.description: The ChangeIMSI method is used by the external service to change the Active IMSI of a SIM Card.If the request is accepted by the service, a requestId will be returned. This requestId can be used by the getStatus method in order to know the status of any request. Otherwise, the system will return an error code.

14, VALIDITY wrong format

15, POR_TYPE wrong format

45, ATTEMPTS wrong format

post.description: This method can be used to request the OTA Platform to install and instantiate an applet from its applets pool to a specific SIM card. Please note that there are mandatory and optional parameters. If called entity decides not to use these parameters, they will be omitted in the corresponding command of installation.

post.description: This method can be used to request the OTA Platform to install a package from its applets pool to a specific SIM card. Please note that there are mandatory and optional parameters. If called entity decides not to use these parameters, they will be omitted in the corresponding command of installation.

post.description:
The ReadContentFile method is used by the external service as a means of reading file contents of a SIM Card.
If the request is accepted by the service, a requestID will be returned. This requestID can be used by the getStatus method to know the status of any request in the future. Otherwise, the system will return an error code.

post.description:
The SendScenario method is used by the external service as a means of sending operations group by a scenario to a SIM Card.
If the request is accepted by the service, a requestId will be returned. This requestId can be used by
the getStatus method to know the status of any request in the future. Otherwise, the system will return an error code
The setactive method is used by the MNO service to activate an IMSI

200.description:
The possible status and descriptions are: 

 0, OK

 1, OTA Platform Internal Error

 5, Unknown IMSI

 22, No MSISDN associated

post.description: The simSwap method is used by the MNO service to assign the MSISDN to a new IMSI or ICCID. If the MSISDN is assigned to another IMSI/ICCID in OTA Platform database, this assignation will be removed. If new IMSI/ICCID passed in the method call is assigned to another MSISDN, this assignation will be removed too.
